SEARCH
Modul wbh.wbh_projekt_privatebuchhaltung
Package wbh.wbh_projekt_privatebuchhaltung.controller

Klasse Controller_data

java.lang.Object
wbh.wbh_projekt_privatebuchhaltung.controller.Controller_data
public class Controller_data extends Object
The Controller_data class handles all database operations for the private accounting project. It provides methods to create tables, load data from the database into a Profile object, and save various entities (UserSettings, BankAccount, TransactionCategory, Transaction, Goal, Badge) into the database. All operations are logged using SLF4J.

    • getConnection

      private Connection getConnection(String dbFilePath) throws SQLException
      Establishes and returns a database connection using the provided database file path.
      Parameter:
      dbFilePath - the database file path.
      Gibt zurück:
      a Connection object.
      Löst aus:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • executeSQL

      private void executeSQL(Statement statement, String sql) throws SQLException
      Executes the given SQL command using the provided Statement.
      Parameter:
      statement - the Statement to execute the SQL command.
      sql - the SQL command to execute.
      Löst aus:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • logError

      private void logError(String operation, Exception e)
      Logs an error message for the given operation and exception.
      Parameter:
      operation - a description of the operation being performed.
      e - the Exception that was thrown.

    • logSuccess

      private void logSuccess(String operation)
      Logs a success message for the given operation.
      Parameter:

    • logFailure

      private void logFailure(String operation)
      Logs a failure message for the given operation.
      Parameter:
      operation - a description of the operation that failed.

    • createTables

      public void createTables(String path)
      Creates the necessary database tables. Drops the existing tables if they exist, and then creates new ones. Note: The "Goal" table is intentionally created twice to preserve original functionality.
      Parameter:
      path - the database file path.

    • loadData

      public Profile loadData(String path)
      Loads data from the database into a Profile object. It loads transaction categories, bank accounts, user settings, goals, transactions, and badges.
      Parameter:
      path - the database file path.
      Gibt zurück:
      a Profile object populated with data from the database.

    • getTransactions

      private void getTransactions(String dbFilePath, Profile profile)
      Loads transactions from the database and adds them to the Profile.
      Parameter:
      dbFilePath - the database file path.
      profile - the Profile object to populate.

    • getUserSettings

      private UserSettings getUserSettings(String dbFilePath)
      Loads UserSettings from the database.
      Parameter:
      dbFilePath - the database file path.
      Gibt zurück:
      a UserSettings object populated with data from the database, or null if an error occurs.

    • getAllTransactionCategories

      private javafx.collections.ObservableList<TransactionCategory> getAllTransactionCategories(String dbFilePath)
      Loads all TransactionCategories from the database.
      Parameter:
      dbFilePath - the database file path.
      Gibt zurück:
      an ObservableList of TransactionCategory objects.

      private javafx.collections.ObservableList<BankAccount> getAllBankAccounts(String dbFilePath)
      Loads all BankAccounts from the database.
      Parameter:

      Gibt zurück:
      an ObservableList of BankAccount objects.

      private void getGoals(String dbFilePath, Profile profile)

      profile - the Profile object to populate.

    • getAllBadges

      private void getAllBadges(String dbFilePath, Profile profile)
      Loads all Badges from the database and adds them to the Profile.
      Parameter:
      dbFilePath - the database file path.
      profile - the Profile object to populate.

    • saveProfile

      public void saveProfile(String dbFilePath, Profile profile)
      Saves the entire Profile to the database. It creates the necessary tables and then saves UserSettings, BankAccounts, TransactionCategories, Transactions (incomes and expenses), Goals, and Badges.
      Parameter:
      dbFilePath - the database file path.
      profile - the Profile object to save.

    • saveUserSettings

      public void saveUserSettings(String dbFilePath, UserSettings userSettings)
      Saves UserSettings to the database.
      Parameter:
      dbFilePath - the database file path.
      userSettings - the UserSettings object to save.

    • saveBadge

      public void saveBadge(String dbFilePath, Badge badge)
      Saves a Badge to the database.
      Parameter:
      dbFilePath - the database file path.
      badge - the Badge object to save.

    • saveBankAccount

      public void saveBankAccount(String dbFilePath, BankAccount account)
      Saves a BankAccount to the database.
      Parameter:
      dbFilePath - the database file path.
      account - the BankAccount object to save.

    • saveTransactionCategory

      public void saveTransactionCategory(String dbFilePath, TransactionCategory transactionCategory)
      Saves a TransactionCategory to the database.
      Parameter:
      dbFilePath - the database file path.
      transactionCategory - the TransactionCategory object to save.

    • getNewId

      private int getNewId(PreparedStatement preparedStatement) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the newly generated ID after an insert operation.
      Parameter:
      preparedStatement - the PreparedStatement used for the insert.
      Gibt zurück:
      the generated ID, or -1 if no ID was returned.
      Löst aus:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
